channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-16690|2024-09-16T19:50:53.945Z -- sap -- sap%20plant%20connectivity
item.description: A malicious DLL preload attack possible on NwSapSetup and Installation self-extracting program for SAP Plant Connectivity 2.3 and 15.0. It is possible that SAPSetup / NwSapSetup.exe loads system DLLs like DWMAPI.dll (located in your Syswow64 / System32 folder) from the folder the executable is in and not from the system location. The desired behavior is that system dlls are only loaded from the system folders. If a dll with the same name as the system dll is located in the same folder as the executable, this dll is loaded and code is executed.

item.title: CVE-2017-16685|2024-09-16T19:01:36.283Z -- sap -- sap%20business%20warehouse%20universal%20data%20integration
item.description: Cross-Site scripting (XSS) in SAP Business Warehouse Universal Data Integration, from 7.10 to 7.11, 7.20, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50, due to insufficient encoding of user controlled inputs.

item.title: CVE-2017-16684|2024-09-16T18:49:41.000Z -- sap -- sap%20business%20intelligence%20promotion%20management%20application
item.description: SAP Business Intelligence Promotion Management Application, Enterprise 4.10, 4.20, and 4.30, does not perform authentication checks for functionalities that require user identity.

item.title: CVE-2017-16681|2024-09-16T17:48:18.515Z -- sap -- sap%20business%20intelligence%20promotion%20management%20application.
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in SAP Business Intelligence Promotion Management Application, Enterprise 4.10, 4.20, 4.30, as user controlled inputs are not sufficiently encoded.

item.title: CVE-2017-16680|2024-09-16T18:59:59.098Z -- sap -- sap%20hana%20extended%20application%20services
item.description: Two potential audit log injections in SAP HANA extended application services 1.0, advanced model: 1) Certain HTTP/REST endpoints of controller service are missing user input validation which could allow unprivileged attackers to forge audit log lines. Hence the interpretation of audit log files could be hindered or misdirected. 2) User Account and Authentication writes audit logs into syslog and additionally writes the same audit entries into a log file. Entries in the log file miss escaping. Hence the interpretation of audit log files could be hindered or misdirected, while the entries in syslog are correct.

item.title: CVE-2017-16679|2024-09-16T17:03:13.412Z -- sap -- sap%20startup%20service
item.description: URL redirection vulnerability in SAP's Startup Service, SAP KERNEL 32 NUC, SAP KERNEL 32 Unicode, SAP KERNEL 64 NUC, SAP KERNEL 64 Unicode 7.21, 7.21EXT, 7.22 and 7.22EXT; SAP KERNEL 7.21, 7.22, 7.45, 7.49 and 7.52, that allows an attacker to redirect users to a malicious site.
